meanings.meaning_en_US: Located or operating below the surface of the ground.

examples.sentence: The [underground] tunnels are part of a historic network.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些地下隧道是歷史網絡的一部分。

examples.sentence: They discovered an [underground] spring in their backyard.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在後院發現了一個地下泉。

examples.sentence: Underground artists often explore taboo subjects.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 地下藝術家經常探討禁忌主題。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A subway or metro system.

examples.sentence: She prefers taking the [underground] to avoid traffic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她更喜歡乘坐地鐵以避免交通擁堵。

examples.sentence: The [underground] is a fast way to get around the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 地鐵是快速在城市中移動的一種方式。

examples.sentence: He often reads while riding the [underground].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他常在乘坐地鐵時閱讀。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The way that someone or something looks.

examples.sentence: Her [appearance] at the event surprised everyone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在活動上的出現讓每個人都感到驚訝。

examples.sentence: The [appearance] of the building has changed over the years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座建築的外觀多年來一直在變化。

examples.sentence: He focused on his personal [appearance] for the interview.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在面試時專注於自己的外觀。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person of the same age, status, or ability as another specified person.

examples.sentence: He is a good [fellow] who always helps others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是一個總是幫助他人的好同儕。

examples.sentence: My [fellow] students and I studied together.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我和我的同儕一起學習。

examples.sentence: She introduced me to her [fellow] writers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她把我介紹給她的作家同儕。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A small restaurant or coffeehouse.

examples.sentence: They met at the local [cafe].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在當地的咖啡館見面。

examples.sentence: I enjoy reading while sipping coffee in a [cafe].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡在咖啡館邊喝咖啡邊閱讀。

examples.sentence: The [cafe] serves delicious pastries.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家咖啡館提供美味的糕點。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A loose, granular substance resulting from the erosion of rocks.

examples.sentence: The beach is covered in soft [sand].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 海灘上覆蓋著柔軟的沙子。

examples.sentence: Children love to play in the [sand] at the park.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們喜歡在公園的沙子裡玩。

examples.sentence: The artist used [sand] to create beautiful patterns.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 藝術家用沙子創造了美麗的圖案。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A reward given for excellence or achievement.

examples.sentence: She won a [prize] for her outstanding performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 因為她出色的表現，她贏得了獎品

examples.sentence: The scholarship is a highly prestigious [prize].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這獎學金是非常有聲望的獎品

examples.sentence: He was thrilled to receive the [prize] for the best student.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他很高興能獲得最佳學生獎

meanings.meaning_en_US: At any time.

examples.sentence: You can call me [anytime].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以隨時打電話給我

examples.sentence: She is available [anytime] during the week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在週內隨時都有空

examples.sentence: Feel free to drop by [anytime].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 隨時來訪都可以

meanings.meaning_en_US: Sick or unwell.

examples.sentence: He felt [ill] after eating too much.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他吃太多後感到生病。

examples.sentence: The [ill] child needs rest.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個生病的孩子需要休息。

examples.sentence: She has been feeling [ill] for days.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她已經感覺生病好幾天。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To put down, especially gently or carefully.

examples.sentence: He decided to [lay] the book on the table.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定把書放在桌上

examples.sentence: Please [lay] the blanket out for a picnic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把毛毯攤開以便野餐

examples.sentence: She will [lay] the foundation for the new project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將為新項目奠定基礎

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who works, especially one who does manual or unskilled work.

examples.sentence: Every [worker] deserves fair wages.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位工作者都應該獲得公平的工資。

examples.sentence: The factory employs over 200 [workers].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家工廠雇用了超過200名工人。

examples.sentence: She is a skilled [worker] in her field.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在她的領域是一位技術熟練的工作者。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having life; living; not dead.

examples.sentence: The plant is still [alive] despite the harsh winter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 雖然嚴冬，這植物依然活著

examples.sentence: He felt [alive] when he traveled to new places.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當他去新的地方時，他感到活著

examples.sentence: She hugged her pet to feel the warmth of something [alive].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她擁抱她的寵物，以感受某種活著的溫暖

meanings.meaning_en_US: To establish the truth or validity of something.

examples.sentence: You need to [prove] your identity to access the account.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要證明你的身份才能訪問該帳戶。

examples.sentence: The results will [prove] his theory correct.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 結果將證明他的理論是正確的。

examples.sentence: They hope to [prove] their innocence in court.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們希望在法庭上證明自己的清白。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A declaration or assurance that one will do a particular thing or that a particular thing will happen.

examples.sentence: He made a [promise] to help her with her project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他承諾幫助她完成項目

examples.sentence: The [promise] of a better future motivates us.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 對更美好未來的承諾激勵著我們

examples.sentence: Breaking a [promise] can lead to distrust.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 違背承諾可能會導致不信任

meanings.meaning_en_US: To like one thing or person better than another.

examples.sentence: I [prefer] tea to coffee.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我[比較喜歡]茶而不是咖啡。

examples.sentence: She [prefers] reading over watching TV.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她[比較喜歡]看書而不是看電視。

examples.sentence: They [prefer] outdoor activities.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們[比較喜歡]戶外活動。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of a color intermediate between red and blue.

examples.sentence: She wore a beautiful [purple] gown to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她穿了一件美麗的紫色長裙出席派對

examples.sentence: The flowers bloomed in shades of [purple].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些花以紫色的色調綻放

examples.sentence: His favorite crayon is [purple].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他最喜歡的蠟筆是紫色的

meanings.meaning_en_US: The state of being, or having objective reality.

examples.sentence: The existence of life on other planets is still a mystery.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 其他星球上生命的存在仍然是一個謎。

examples.sentence: Many philosophers debate the nature of existence.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多哲學家討論存在的本質。

examples.sentence: His existence was marked by numerous achievements.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的存在標誌著無數的成就。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A building where people are kept as a punishment for a crime.

examples.sentence: He was sent to [prison] for committing theft.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 因為犯竊，他被送到監獄

examples.sentence: The [prison] was built in the 1800s.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這所監獄建於19世紀

examples.sentence: Life in [prison] can be very difficult.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 監獄生活可能非常艱難

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ability to do something well; expertise.

examples.sentence: She has a great [skill] in painting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在繪畫方面有很大的技能。

examples.sentence: Developing [skill] takes time and practice.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 發展技能需要時間和練習。

examples.sentence: His [skill] in negotiation is impressive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在談判方面的技能令人印象深刻。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A barren area of land where little precipitation occurs and consequently living conditions are hostile.

examples.sentence: The [desert] is home to many unique species.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 沙漠中棲息著許多獨特的物種。

examples.sentence: They traveled across the vast [desert].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們穿越了廣闊的沙漠。

examples.sentence: Survival in the [desert] can be challenging.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在沙漠中生存可能很具挑戰性。
